member.name: T:LightBuzz.Face.Face
member.summary: Represents a human face.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Face.Face.MAX_FACE_POINTS
member.summary: The number of the detected face points.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Face.Face.Points
member.summary: A list of the detected face points.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Face.Face.Nose
member.summary: The center of the nose.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Face.Face.Jaw
member.summary: The chin.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Face.Face.EyeLeft
member.summary: The center of the left eye.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Face.Face.EyeRight
member.summary: The center of the right eye.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Face.Face.Mouth
member.summary: The center of the mouth.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.Face.NoseCollection
member.summary: Returns the collection of points that belong to the nose.
member.returns: A list of points in the 2D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.Face.EyeLeftCollection
member.summary: Returns the collection of points that belong to the left eye.
member.returns: A list of points in the 2D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.Face.EyeRightCollection
member.summary: Returns the collection of points that belong to the right eye.
member.returns: A list of points in the 2D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.Face.EyebrowLeftCollection
member.summary: Returns the collection of points that belong to the left eyebrow.
member.returns: A list of points in the 2D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.Face.EyebrowRightCollection
member.summary: Returns the collection of points that belong to the right eyebrow.
member.returns: A list of points in the 2D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.Face.MouthCollection
member.summary: Returns the collection of points that belong to the mouth.
member.returns: A list of points in the 2D space.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.Face.JawCollection
member.summary: Returns the collection of points that belong to the jaw.
member.returns: A list of points in the 2D space.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Face.FaceDetector
member.summary: Detects a list of faces in a 2D frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.FaceDetector.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new face detector using the specified Machine Learning model.
member.param: The path to the model file.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.FaceDetector.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the face detector and clears any unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.FaceDetector.GetFaces(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the detected faces.

member.summary: Returns the detected faces.
member.param: The number of bytes per pixel.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.FaceDetector.GetFaces(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the detected faces.
member.param: A path to a JPEG or PNG image.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.FaceDetector.GetFace(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the first of the detected faces.
member.param: The number of bytes per pixel.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Face.FaceDetector.GetFace(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the first of the detected faces within a sub-rectangle of the image frame.
member.param: The width of the image frame.
The height of the image frame.
The number of bytes per pixel.
